snippet: The American Olympian Ryan Hall will skip the New York City Marathon because of several nagging injuries. Hall has been bothered by plantar fasciitis, among other problems.
abstract: American Olympic runner Ryan Hall will skip the New York City Marathon because of several injuries.
lead_paragraph: The American Olympian Ryan Hall will skip the New York City Marathon because of several nagging injuries. Hall has been bothered by plantar fasciitis, among other problems.

headline.seo: Olympian Ryan Hall to Skip New York City Marathon
headline.main: Top American Skipping New York City Marathon
headline.print_headline: Top American Skipping New York City Marathon
